Text: Worked great. if anyone has pajama sam 2 could they please put it up. thanks.
Does your computer have to be 32 bit?

Got it. after much pain, I finally got it to work.
1. Extract .iso to folder on desktop.
2. Download an amazing program called "ScummVm" 
3. Open ScummVm, add game, and select extracted folder. 
4. add to library and click start
